DOC.brief_summary: This study design compare length continuous albuterol administration two different albuterol formulation , BAC contain albuterol versus preservative free albuterol .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study compare length continuous albuterol administration patient receive BAC contain albuterol versus preservative free albuterol . Secondary objective include comparison therapy escalation , asthma score , force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) discharge , length hospital stay , cost .
DOC.criteria: Patients include study admit 5th floor Kosair Children 's Hospital treatment acute asthma exacerbation , initiate continuous albuterol inhalation therapy , 5 17 year age . Patients exclude study transfer 5th floor Pediatric Intensive Care Unit ( PICU ) , admit indication acute asthma exacerbation , remove inpatient asthma protocol give reason .
